attributes.action: What the Government is doing in regards to Unidentified aerial phenomenon (UAP)
attributes.additional_details:
Well primarily our US allies have set up hearings in congress on this matter and , I believe with how unstable at the moment this should be brought to the public's attention .
The US our closet allies are now taking this issue as a matter of National Security. We should do the same .
attributes.background:
To give clarity on what our Government is doing in regards to UAP's,
if anything .
This is due to ongoing incursions of alleged drones into US and UK military bases, Which could be a threat to our national security.

rejection.details:
The Government has recently responded to a written question setting out its policy in relation to Unidentified Aerial Phenomena.

You can read the Government's response to the question here: https://questions-statements.parliament.uk/written-questions/detail/2024-12-05/18321/

If you'd like the Government to change its policy, you could start a petition about that.
